USER QUERY: When I press the "Fast On" (DFON) on either LivingRoom Controller - C or - D during weekdays between 07:00 and 09:00, set their backlights to a medium level and write the changes.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekday morning fast-on → set medium backlight C+D",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When DFON pressed on C or D between 07:00-09:00 Mon-Fri set medium backlight and persist",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "71 5F 2E 3", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "71 5F 2E 4", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "07:00", "to": { "time": "09:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 3", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 90, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 3", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 90, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 4", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "COC trigger: DFON on controller C or D during weekday morning window. Use BL with unit index (uom 25) to set a medium backlight value (90). Call WDU after each BL to persist the change. Weekly schedule restricts to Mon-Fri 07:00-09:00."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
